text:
Shah Rukh Khan is not just a superstar. For many, he is their mentor, guide and life-advisor. He is a phenomenal orator and we have enough proofs. Every time he says something at an event or shares time with his fans, he manages to leave a great impact that lasts forever.
Today, Shah Rukh Khan is again being talked about on the internet and the reason is heartwarming. Just a few days ago, Shah Rukh Khan met acid-attack survivors before their correction surgeries. Apart from meeting and spending time with the women, he sat down to impart some important life-lessons.
Twitter
A video that is being shared on social media has Shah Rukh Khan meeting these women. Taking time from his busy schedule, SRK sat down to make them feel at ease.
Twitter
While interacting with the survivors, Shah Rukh Khan said,
Twitter

"The main idea is to believe the fact that you will do something for yourself. If you have the intent everything else will follow. For every one of us, it's important to ensure we work for ourselves. We should do our own work without depending on anyone else. Even if it's a small job we should do it to fend for ourselves. And at the end of the day, we must be independent. In my heart, this is like a family. All of you are like my own people. I don't know much about each of you, because everyone has their personal lives and I don't want to get into those details. The main thing is to believe we can be independent. I'll be in touch with the doctors and get regular updates. We will try and get the best people to work with us.”

Shah Rukh Khan started Meer foundation back in 2017 and it largely focuses on improving the lives of strong acid-attack survivors.
